TASK: Craft an item of type: sponge
inventory=[{"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 37, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 16}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "painting", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}]
thought: I need to craft a sponge, which requires smelting a wet_sponge. The only wet_sponge is in slot 12, so I will smelt it into slot 11.
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 11 with quantity 1
